sync-libraries: Import all epub from libraries to your vault
no libraries: You have not added any library to the settings page
no book in libraries: There is no epub in the libraries
Tag: The tag is used to identify book objects
Library: The plugin will search for .epub files from these paths (absolute path).
byDrag: Import .epub file by drag it to obsidian vault. The .epub  file will be deleted after importing.
Save_path: The plugin will save the imported book to this path (relative path).
Assets_path: The plugin will save the assets of the imported book to this path (relative path).
Hierarchy_depth: Determine the Hierarchy depth of generated markdown notes (if 0, a single note is generated).
noteTemplate: A template with variables for each page.
Propertys template: The plugin will add these propertys to the imported book.
imageFormat: The type of imageFormat. caption only for chinese now.
reformatting: Reformat the content. This may destroy the original formatting of the book.
Auto_open_right_panel: The plugin will open the book note on right panel when you open a book.
Remove_duplicate_folders: Remove duplicate folders(risky, for users who understand the usefulness of this option, or developers).
more_log: Output more logs to the console for easier debugging.
backup_directory_Path: The plugin will use this directory to back up books in .zip format(absolute path).
Enable_Read_Progress_Manager: Enable the read progress manager to track your reading progress.
export-zip: Export a book to the backup directory in .zip format
import-zip: Import a .zip book from the backup directory into the vault in .zip format
